ul.li: Put them together in the right way.
Make the right electrical connections with wires.
Load the configured firmware onto your microcontroller.
Establish contact with the running firmware.
Put your mover in home position.
Load some gcode into your host or SD card.
Forgive the designer for his mistakes.
Wait for it. Your print will finish eventually unless something bad happens.
Go grab a hot beverage, watch some TV, scroll your social media, talk to friends.
When print finishes: Take pictures. Share :)
